text:
Hi! I was wondering if you know if it's possible to add radio buttons, check boxes or something else to provide options? Like this:

2 possible dates
1. Torsdag den 25e mars 14.00 – 16.00
2. Torsdag den 15e april 14.00 – 16.00
 
Svarsalternativ –
• Tillfälle 1
• Tillfälle 2
• Tillfälle 1 eller 2 (kan delta båda datumen)

Hi! I am trying to use *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates#field-based-parameters|Field Based Parameters>* when adding a custom global module to my template.
Like so:
`{% module "module_global_module" path="/Website/modules/__global_modules/test_module" label="Test Module", my_text_field='Hello' %}`

However the value isn't being passed on to the rendered page. Could it be that *Field Based Parameters* only work for Local Modules and not Global Modules?

Hi everyone,

Can anyone guide me, how can I arrange the js and CSS files so that I get better speed in Google page speed test
